channel.title: Need help with a server!
channel.description:
:)~~WELCOME TO WHAT WILL BE BLOODFEVERPK~~ :)
Hi, Im Driger on what soon will be ~BLOODFEVERPK~, I am co-owner of bloodfeverpk, and we NEED HELP! How to contact us for direct help. ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ HAMACHI INFO- CONTACT US THROUGH HAMCAHI! Hamachi id-mnchmn2 pass-123 id- 5.130.54.84 Right click the netowrk and press "chat" and get us on there ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~WHAT WE NEED HELP WITH~ (WICH IS PRETTY MUCH DARN-NEAR EVERYTHING) 1.CODING 2.SETTING UP MONSTERS 3.SETTING UP NPC'S 4.MAKING MONSTERS DROP ITEMS 5. SETTING UP SHOPS W\ ITEMS IN THEM 6.JAD 7.EASTER EVENT 8.EXP 9.MAKING THE MAX LEVEL 135 10.TRAINING- SETTING UP DUMMYS, DOORS, AND HAYBALES FOR TRAINING STRENGTH, ATTACK, AND DEFENCE 11.HOW TO SET PK BOUNDRIES 12.HOW TO GET A PORT 11. HOW TO GET A ::CHAR SETTING (CHARACTER APPEARANCE) 12. HOW TO GET A SPECIAL ATTACK 13.HOW TO GET WORKING BOWS 14. ANYTHING THAT YOU CAN THINK OF TO MAKE OUR SERVER A BIT BETTER! PLEASE HELP US! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ ~REMINDER~ CONTACT US THROUGH HAMACHI! Hamachi-mnchmn2 pass-123 id-5.130.54.84 ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ pic's coming when the server is going good! PLEASE HELP US! ~~DRIGER~~
~ADMIN ON BLOODFEVERPK~ ~ADMIN ON NIC'S SERVER~ ~MOD ON 3 OTHERS~
